programme.title: A Mulher Perfeita, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A história de seis mulheres que vivem em um país onde muitas pessoas lutam para se converter naquilo que todos os homens desejam: a mulher perfeita. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Uma História de Amor e Fúria, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um homem com quase 600 anos de idade acompanha a história do Brasil. Ele enfrenta as batalhas entre tupinambás e tupiniquins, passa pela Balaiada e o movimento de resistência contra a ditadura militar, antes de enfrentar a guerra pela água em 2096. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Sequestro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Zara e Brian vivem uma vida perfeita em uma pequena cidade até que um estranho misterioso do passado secreto de Zara sequestra sua filha. Agora, eles precisam fazer de tudo para salvar sua vida. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Departamento Q: O Ausente, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Vinte anos depois do assassinato de jovens gêmeos, o caso acaba na mesa de Carls Morck e ele logo percebe que algo está terrivelmente errado. Na época, o caso havia sido encerrado com a condenação de um forasteiro. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: E.A.S. - Esquadrão Antissequestro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um grupo de terroristas sequestra a filha de um jogador de futebol e planeja explodir o Maracanã em plena Copa do Mundo. Rafael, ex-integrante do Esquadrão Antissequestro, tem a missão de salvar a menina e impedir o desastre. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Vigilante Mascarado, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Lutador profissional abandona a vida de violência e se torna pastor em uma pequena cidade. Entretanto, a criminalidade do local o obriga a retomar os velhos hábitos. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: À Procura, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Mathew vive desespero, terror e fúria quando descobre que sua filha foi sequestrada. Oito anos depois da tragédia, uma nova pista aparece e agora há esperança de que a jovem ainda esteja viva. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: American Sicario, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O gângster americano Erik Vasquez planeja se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, mas acaba fazendo inimigos tanto entre poderosos cartéis quanto entre seus aliados. Seu casamento com Gloria, que está grávida, se deteriora. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Assalto em Dose Dupla, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Duas quadrilhas atrapalhadas e inexperientes resolvem assaltar o mesmo banco, no mesmo dia. No meio da confusão, Tripp, um charmoso cliente, faz de tudo para proteger a bela caixa Kaitlin, e para completar, o sistema de segurança bloqueia as saídas. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Golpe de Risco, (1970)

programme.title: Double Dragon, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O Mestre das Sombras descobre um poderoso artefato do Dragão chamado Olho do Dragão, que concede ao seu detentor o poder de visão. Jimmy consegue o artefato e isso lhe dá poderes incríveis. No entanto, também começa a possuí-lo. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alma conhece Abigail na festa de Esteban; Abigail confessa que beijou Juan Pablo; Juan Pablo aparece na festa, encerrando sua curta lua de mel, e anuncia que ele e Dubraska adotaram uma filha em Roma. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Lupe consola Alma, que está deprimida em seu quarto por ter visto Juan Pablo beijando Abigail; León volta à mansão para visitar Alma e é recebido por Esteban. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Cecilia conhece Alma e fica surpresa; Mônica convence Dubraska a se voltar contra Alma; Juan Pablo conta a Abigail que está apaixonado por Alma e diz o quanto ela é maravilhosa; Dubraska ataca Alma verbalmente, mas ela diz querer ser sua amiga. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alberto está decidido a enfrentar a avó para descobrir onde está sua irmã. Danilo tenta impedi-lo, dizendo que Paula é má e já os fez sofrer demais. Na verdade, Danilo teme que Paula revele que Alberto é adotado. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Dona Paula mantém Alma amarrada em casa e aplica uma bruxaria com galhos e água benta; Caridad fica muito preocupada com o desaparecimento de Alma e teme por sua vida. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Alma continua sequestrada por Paula, que a acusa diante dos santos e diz que ela é a filha do pecado. Segundo ela, os espíritos do além querem que ela destrua Alma; Mônica acusa Alma de ter seduzido Esteban e Juan Pablo e diz que ela precisa pagar. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Alma Indomável, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mulher devastada pela pobreza se torna uma joia preciosa quando polida pelo amor de sua vida. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Acampamento do Barulho, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Encorajado pelo avô, Spence tenta aprender a lidar com seus medos e a fazer novos amigos em um acampamento cristão. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Três Ladrões e um Bebê, (1970)

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Uma mãe solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mítica, um elfo, vive no apartamento há séculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa é justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Aventura e Tanto, (1970)

programme.title: Ma ma, (1970)

programme.title: Magal e os Formigas, (1970)

programme.title: Apex, (1970)

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Roomies
programme.desc: Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) drives Steve (Steve Harvey) buggy when she moves in with him while her apartment is being fumigated.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Whole Left Side
programme.desc: Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) welcomes the opportunity to impress Cedrics (Cedric The Entertainer) beloved Grandma Puddin.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Two Big Daddies
programme.desc: Posing as a single father, Steve (Steve Harvey) uses young Romeo (Merlin Santana) to rope in an attractive single mother (guest star Alex Datcher).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Boomerang
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) becomes a fool for love when he falls for Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) friend (guest star Roxanne Beckford). With William Lee Scott.

programme.title: The Harlem Globetrotters: Secrets of the City - Stuttgart; Sydney
programme.desc: In Stuttgart, Germany, join the spring festival in traditional German attire and connect with the local Black expat community; Bulldog and Wham travel to Sydney, Australia, where they dive into the world of traditional Aussie sports.

programme.title: The Harlem Globetrotters: Secrets of the City - London
programme.desc: Torch and Moose touch down in London on a mission to uncover the citys best kept secrets, one hidden door at a time.

programme.title: Grandmas House
programme.desc: A young woman recounts how her life changed after she moved in with her grandmother.

programme.title: NEW! Shark PowerDetect with DuoClean Detect Technology
programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing, and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.title: Ellipse Fit by LegXercise-FREE Deluxe Offer for First 300 Callers!
programme.desc: Do you spend too many hours sitting at a desk? Do you have a tough time exercising due to joint pain? Ellipse Fit will strengthen your legs, boost mobility, and improve circulation with low impact leg movement. Order NOW And claim your FREE Bonus!

programme.title: Risk-Free Hearing Aid!
programme.desc: Call today to try the high quality, low-price Audien hearing aid, risk-free! No doctor or fittings necessary.

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every five seconds theres a victim of identity theft; LifeLock helps alert, restore identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: Cindy Crawford talks about the latest breakthroughs in skincare
programme.desc: Join Cindy Crawford as she talks to real customers about the breakthrough skincare system that keeps them looking their best. Take a trip to the stunning French countryside to see the rare French melon that defies the aging process.

programme.title: Pain Relief Revealed
programme.desc: Discover the hidden story of OmegaXL with John Walsh. He dives deep into the groundbreaking supplement that promises hope and relief for millions battling joint pain and inflammation.

programme.title: Freedom to Leave the House! Inogen Portable Oxygen
programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Strands of Life
programme.desc: Holding on to time and relationships even when they are slipping through our fingers.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - The Iberian Pig
programme.desc: A do-it-yourself sibling trio serving Spanish cuisine.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - Little Bear
programme.desc: Finding out why this restaurant calls itself Michelin Tire style dining, bringing Szechuan and Jewish cuisines to an innovative plate of incredible flavor.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - Pit Boss BBQ
programme.desc: Host Zak Wallace takes a trip down memory lane and gets a taste of Hapevilles finest.

programme.title: City Eats: Atlanta - This Is It!
programme.desc: Celebrating the 40th anniversary of the largest Black-owned chain of Southern comfort food in the Southeast with host Zak Wallace.

programme.title: If You Really Love Me
programme.desc: The deceased mother of three women returns to Earth as an angel to help them rediscover what is truly important in life.

programme.title: The Forgettable Life of Liam White
programme.desc: An uninspired novelist begins a journey of self-reflection and reconciliation when he learns that his cancer has returned.

programme.title: Family Time - No Lie Zone
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa ban all lying in the household, including the little white lies that hold the family together.

programme.title: Family Time - Lisas Leftovers
programme.desc: Lisa gets upset when her sister Lori begins dating her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Family Time - Powering Down
programme.desc: Tony feels his family is drifting apart so he bans technology in the household.

programme.title: Family Time - The Oops Baby
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa must deal with the possibility of a new baby.

programme.title: Family Time - Cut It Out
programme.desc: Tony spends time in the local barbershop with friends; Lori considers her options for having a baby.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Easy Rider
programme.desc: A motorcycle accident changes Bernies perspective about protecting the kids; Jordan is caught trying to sell Bernies girlie magazines to other boys at school.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Whos That Lady?
programme.desc: Dr. Phil McGraw counsels Bernie on how to deal with Wanda, who feels left out after Bernie and the guys draft a woman (MoNique) into their group.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Mac-Inations
programme.desc: Neighbor Carl Reiner (guest starring as himself) plays the ultimate practical joke on Bernie. Ashton Kutcher guest stars as himself.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - That Old Mac Magic
programme.desc: American Idol judges Paula Abdul and Randy Jackson critique Bernies commercial.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Talk
programme.desc: Bernie stops by the Playboy Mansion to get advice from Hugh Hefner on how to talk to Jordan about sex.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - The Roof Is on Fire
programme.desc: Regina rooms with Steve when a roof fire leaves her homeless; romance heats up between Romeo and Sara.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - I Do, I Dont
programme.desc: Steve refuses to allow Snoop Doggy Dogg and Sean Puffy Combs to use music from the Hi-Tops until they resolve their rivalry.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Cant Buy Me Love
programme.desc: A new student (Kenan Thompson) gives Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) an extravagant birthday gift, but Steve (Steve Harvey) pretends it is from him.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Whatever You Want
programme.desc: Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) new assistant (Terri J. Vaughn) falls in love with Cedric (Cedric the Entertainer); Romeo (Merlin Santana) befriends his formerly overweight neighbor (Ariyan Johnson).

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Caribbean Flavors
programme.desc: Join Yo-Yo and her good friend Teianna in the kitchen for a vibrant explosion of Island flavors and Caribbean vibes! This episode is a celebration of Jamaican culinary traditions, as they whip up a pot full of deliciousness.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Family Cook Off
programme.desc: Todays episode is a family affair, Yo-Yo puts Mama Mia in charge in the kitchen, and Mama Mia does just that ! She cracks the whip to Yo-Yo and her sister April get ready to help prepare Mama Mias famous spaghetti and spicy meatballs.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - All About Steve
programme.desc: A power-hungry Steve fills in for Regina as acting principal for a few days; Cedric and Lovita disagree about their wedding day.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Going, Going, Gone
programme.desc: Steve participates in a bachelor auction where a beautiful young bidder turns out to be a front for an older woman.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Y2K
programme.desc: After Steves extravagant plans fall apart, he rings in the new millennium with Regina, Cedric and Lovita.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Black Streak
programme.desc: Cedric (Cedric the Entertainer) prefers reliving his wild days rather than going to Steves (Steve Harvey) bachelor party. With Wendy Raquel Robinson.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Caribbean Flavors
programme.desc: Join Yo-Yo and her good friend Teianna in the kitchen for a vibrant explosion of Island flavors and Caribbean vibes! This episode is a celebration of Jamaican culinary traditions, as they whip up a pot full of deliciousness.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Family Cook Off
programme.desc: Todays episode is a family affair, Yo-Yo puts Mama Mia in charge in the kitchen, and Mama Mia does just that ! She cracks the whip to Yo-Yo and her sister April get ready to help prepare Mama Mias famous spaghetti and spicy meatballs.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Revenge, Regret or Redeem?
programme.desc: Sometimes its revenge, regret and redeem all at once.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Sweet Life
programme.desc: Bernie circumvents his low-cholesterol diet by sneaking over to a neighbors (guest star Don Rickles) place.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Sin Cup
programme.desc: Bernie and Wanda worry about Jordans religious faith after he defaces a picture of Jesus.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.desc: Friends (Seann William Scott, Breckin Meyer, D.J. Qualls) embark on a lengthy car trip to intercept an illicit videotape mistakenly mailed to ones girlfriend.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994)
programme.desc: An English charmer (Hugh Grant) and a lusty American (Andie MacDowell) make love over a course of surprising events.

programme.title: Nickel Boys (2024)
programme.desc: Elwood Curtis college dreams are shattered when hes sentenced to a brutal reformatory in the Jim Crow South. Clinging to his optimistic worldview, Elwood strikes up a friendship with a fellow Black teen who dispenses fundamental tips for survival.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: "Sex Life" takes an erotic journey into the world of Japanese rope bondage; how a throuple lives, works, plays and incorporates a friend; a dominatrix helps a couple unlock their sexual secrets.

programme.title: Thief (1981)
programme.desc: A safecracker (James Caan) runs into trouble with the mob when he wants to quit after one last heist.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate (1962)
programme.desc: A Korean War heros (Laurence Harvey) commanding officer (Frank Sinatra) discovers he and his platoon were brainwashed.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks (2003)
programme.desc: Recruited by the CIA, a teen works under cover to befriend a girl whose father unknowingly works for an evil organization.

programme.title: September 5 (2024)
programme.desc: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

programme.title: Dance Flick (2009)
programme.desc: Two teens (Shoshana Bush, Damon Wayans Jr.) from opposite sides of the tracks come together through their passion for dancing and their desire to win the mother of all dance battles.

programme.title: Dressed to Kill (1980)
programme.desc: A psychiatrist (Michael Caine), a prostitute (Nancy Allen) and the son of a slain woman (Angie Dickinson) seek a Manhattan slasher.

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance (2001)
programme.desc: A troubled boy claims he witnessed his new stepfather (Vince Vaughn) commit a murder, prompting his father (John Travolta) to investigate.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky (2001)
programme.desc: A wealthy womanizer (Tom Cruise) has trouble distinguishing dreams from reality after a car accident leaves him disfigured.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Changeland (2019)
programme.desc: A man meets up with his best friend in Thailand while going through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Face/Off (1997)
programme.desc: An FBI agent (John Travolta) and his nemesis (Nicolas Cage) trade physical identities.

programme.title: Love, Sex and Robots (2024)
programme.desc: Wild women get it on.

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy (2000)
programme.desc: Spike Lee directed this document of an evening of stand-up comedy performed by four prominent black entertainers.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013)
programme.desc: Irving Zisman (Johnny Knoxville) takes his young and impressionable grandson (Jackson Nicoll) on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact (1996)
programme.desc: Picard (Patrick Stewart), Riker (Jonathan Frakes) and the others set off to stop the half-robot Borg from sabotaging the first warp drive flight in 2063.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Wander (2020)
programme.desc: Hired to investigate a suspicious death in the town of Wander, a paranoid private eye with a troubled past becomes convinced the case is linked to the same conspiracy and cover-up that caused the death of his daughter.

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: The Godfather (1972)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone and his sons, the ruthless yet loyal members of the Corleone family, rule their secretive New York empire with an iron fist.

programme.title: The Score (2001)
programme.desc: A master thief (Robert De Niro) agrees to work with a volatile partner (Edward Norton) for one last heist before he retires.

programme.title: The Yards (2000)
programme.desc: A friends lure of easy money draws an ex-con into the corrupt world of his uncles subway-train business.

programme.title: Backcountry (2014)
programme.desc: A couple (Missy Peregrym, Jeff Roop) on a deep-wilderness hike become hopelessly lost within an aggressive black bears territory.

programme.title: The Killer Inside Me (2010)
programme.desc: An encounter with an aggressive prostitute (Jessica Alba) brings a Texas lawmans (Casey Affleck) homicidal tendencies screaming to the surface.

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption (2010)
programme.desc: Uri Boyka is an inmate trapped in the toughest prison in the world. He is ready to make his comeback in a lethal boxing competition for a shot at freedom.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: Captive (2015)
programme.desc: Recovering drug addict Ashley Smith (Kate Mara) reads Rick Warrens "The Purpose Driven Life" as armed fugitive Brian Nichols (David Oyelowo) holds her hostage in her apartment.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: Equilibrium (2002)
programme.desc: In the future a government agent (Christian Bale) and a band of rebels battle a regime that uses a drug to suppress peoples emotions.

programme.title: Dont Knock Twice (2016)
programme.desc: A mother looking to reconnect with her estranged daughter attracts the attention of a demonic witch.

programme.title: Twisted (2004)
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Jennys Wedding (2015)
programme.desc: When Jenny (Katherine Heigl) decides to marry a woman (Alexis Bledel), her conventional family must accept who she is or risk losing her forever.

programme.title: Boys and Girls (2000)
programme.desc: Two longtime friends (Freddie Prinze Jr., Claire Forlani), each with a string of failed romances, wonder if they should date each other.

programme.title: Down to You (2000)
programme.desc: Two collegians (Freddie Prinze Jr., Julia Stiles) fall in love but have a bumpy affair due to mischievous roommates and the temptation to stray.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008)
programme.desc: Benjamin Button (Brad Pitt) is born an old man in 1918 New Orleans and ages in reverse and, in so doing, becomes intimately familiar with the natures of love and death.

programme.title: Forces of Nature (1999)
programme.desc: A bridegroom (Ben Affleck) hurries by plane to his wedding, but he and his seatmate (Sandra Bullock) must find other modes of travel.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here (2020)
programme.desc: A successful author finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students after being asked to speak at her alma mater.

programme.title: Pretty Red Dress (2022)
programme.desc: The story of Travis, Candice and their daughter, Kenisha, and their relationships with the same red dress.

programme.title: Marvins Room (1996)
programme.desc: A Florida leukemia patient (Diane Keaton) needs her sisters (Meryl Streep) bone marrow, but first they must end a 20-year feud.

programme.title: The Hours (2002)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Queen Bees (2021)
programme.desc: While her house undergoes repairs, fiercely independent senior Helen temporarily moves into a nearby retirement community, where she encounters lusty widows, cutthroat bridge tournaments and a hotbed of bullying "mean girls."

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Shes the Man (2006)
programme.desc: Romantic complications ensue when a student poses as her twin brother and replaces him at his boarding school.

programme.title: Grease 2 (1982)
programme.desc: A square British exchange student (Maxwell Caulfield) turns hip motorcyclist to woo a cool girl (Michelle Pfeiffer) in his 1961 high school.

programme.title: Flashdance (1983)
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh welder works days, dances in a bar at night, dates her boss and chases the dream of acceptance into a prestigious ballet school.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
programme.desc: Young William Shakespeare (Joseph Fiennes) falls for Viola (Gwyneth Paltrow), reawakening his creativity, but she is betrothed to Wessex.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen (2016)
programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Mothers Day (2016)
programme.desc: As Mothers Day draws near, a single mom (Jennifer Aniston) learns that her ex-husband (Timothy Olyphant) is marrying a younger woman (Shay Mitchell), while a recently widowed man (Jason Sudeikis) struggles to raise his two daughters.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard at Guantánamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Regarding Us (2025)
programme.desc: After losing her teaching career, A transgender woman has a profound impact on the lives of two children.

programme.title: The Argument (2020)
programme.desc: When a couple argue about a party and neither will back down, they decide to re-create the evening to determine who is right.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold (2001)
programme.desc: A Manhattan woman (Meg Ryan) falls in love with the 19th-century Duke of Albany (Hugh Jackman) who has stepped through a time portal.

programme.title: The Prince and Me (2004)
programme.desc: Paige, a premedical student, falls in love with Eddie, a Danish prince, who keeps his identity a secret.

programme.title: Runaway Bride (1999)
programme.desc: A New York reporter (Richard Gere) travels to Maryland to profile a woman (Julia Roberts) who left three bridegrooms at the altar.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby (2016)
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall (2024)
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven (2005)
programme.desc: A San Francisco widower (Mark Ruffalo) falls in love with a ghostly doctor (Reese Witherspoon) while subletting her apartment.

programme.title: Election (1999)
programme.desc: Tracy faces no competition in her high school election, but the civics teacher intervenes by encouraging the varsity football player to run for president, resulting in chaos.

programme.title: Superstar (1999)
programme.desc: An energetic schoolgirl (Molly Shannon) hopes to win a talent contest where a prize as a movie extra might lead to her first kiss.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part (2017)
programme.desc: Madison Roland finds love with another man after she leaves her abusive husband, Michael, and changes her identity. All seems well, until Michael discovers Madisons whereabouts and re-creates her nightmare all over again.

programme.title: Ask the Dust (2006)
programme.desc: In Depression-era Los Angeles, a fiery Mexican waitress (Salma Hayek) who wants to improve her lot through marriage meets an aspiring writer (Colin Farrell) of Italian descent.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
programme.desc: A struggling new mother fights a generations-old presence lurking within her familys home, threatening her safety, her sanity, and the life of her infant child.

programme.title: The First Wives Club (1996)
programme.desc: Three 50-ish college friends (Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton) plot revenge after their husbands dump them for younger women.

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton! (2004)
programme.sub-title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton! (2004)
programme.desc: Secretly in love with his friend (Kate Bosworth), a supermarket manager (Topher Grace) becomes jealous when she meets a famous actor (Josh Duhamel).

programme.title: End of Sentence (2019)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a young man reluctantly embarks on a journey with his estranged father to spread his mothers ashes in her native Ireland.

programme.title: I Love You, I Love You Not (1997)
programme.sub-title: I Love You, I Love You Not (1997)
programme.desc: A Jewish prep school student (Claire Danes) shares stories of anti-Semitism with her grandmother (Jeanne Moreau), an Auschwitz survivor.

programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.
